node.name: RainForest Fountain MAKE: NVR STORE
node.description: Compatible to indoor and outdoor while outlook as mini rain forest, this 3-step fountain is economical version of home décor item. With built-in LED lightning its waterfall can be seen at night also its multicolour change in every 2 seconds. (SIZE: 260x195x150mm / WEIGHT: 450 grams)
node.content: Concept that is taken from nature and manufacturer almost copied the rainforest so that the buyer or user can take a feel of being inside the natural environment / 3 step water waterfall create a pleasant sound which resemble as therapy for impatient person / Body is made with microfibre substance that has property of being lightweight, durability, can retain shape and resist pilling / LED lightning are waterproof and replaceable at time of fault while change colours in every 2 seconds / Aquatic pump of 100 watt and 12 horse power has been used to pump the water at level of 1 feet and users remark that this fountain can be used at outside as well with same efficiency like inside.
node.alt: NVR Microfiber Water Fountain 25 x 18 x 14 cm Multicolour

node.name: Lotus Buddha Fountain MAKE: BIG BULK MODEL: Buddha_MWFountain
node.description: Regardless of the use of the fountain, it can offer a tranquil atmosphere and aesthetically pleasing sophistication to an indoor space. The 2 feet buddha with white smoke colour create two waterfall and LED light enhance the environment like its spiritual therapy. (SIZE: 600x300x250mm / WEIGHT: 2 Kg)
node.content: Lord Buddha signify as extraordinary man and not god and may be choosing this theme to make a fountain is concept for providing inner peace / Many users also make indoor garden while placing this 2 feet tall buddha fountain in centre and creating small round sittings around it / Polyfibre material and dust resistive white smoke paint ensures its durability / Tank of fountain is shaped as lotus and on which small aquatic plants can be grown but care is needed so that algae should not get accumulated / LED light is dipped inside the fountain that display like divine light which create spiritual atmosphere for meditation.
node.alt: Big Bulk White Kamal Buddha Lotus Buddha Fiber Indoor Outdoor Fountain with Led Lights for Home Decor and Office Decoration Or Gifting 30.5 x 25.4 x 60.1 cm

node.name: Ganpati statue Fountain MAKE: TIED RIBBONS MODEL: TR-19-FOUNTAIN-GD-PC006
node.description: Spiritual, adorable and creative water fountain with durable pump that pulls water back to the top, so each droplet can be preserved and cycled endless journey. With lord ganesha statue and relaxation sound of dropping water one can find the tranquility in this busy world.  (SIZE: 150x120x100mm / WEIGHT: 300 grams)
node.content: Lord Ganesha is a god of beginning and gifting this creative fountain one can give someone the feeling of new start / Made with highly durable polystone material that is break free from the fall and also repellent to organic algae / 100 watt pump produce 10 horse power which has efficiency to run for entire day and week by week without stoppage for at least 2 months / Compact size make it light weight and positive energy throwing item which can be placed on working desk, home temple or even at outdoor / Water also absorb energy of sound and therefore this relaxation devise can dump the unwanted sound and create spiritual atmosphere / Water pump can be replaced very easily at time of fault and there are numerous small pumps available in local market which are usually satisfy the needs of small water cooler.
node.alt: TIED RIBBONS Ganesha Ganpati Statue Tabletop Decorative Water Fountain Waterfall Showpiece for Home Outdoor Garden Decoration House Warming Gift

node.name: FireLamp Fountain MAKE: CHRONIKLE MODEL: CWGW12325
node.description: Essence of beauty and charm to the interiors and also bring positive aura to the environment. 4 step water fountain consume almost 5-7 litre of water and can be used outside to attract birds in garden for drinking. (SIZE: 410x310x230mm / WEIGHT: 1.5Kg)
node.content: Highly recommended for outdoor garden to attract bird for drinking and creating a natural environment / Polystone material did not absorb any water and remain unaffected to most of the chemicals / Speed of the water pump can be adjusted manually and also LED lights can be tuned in different colours / Although algae accumulation never happened over the polystone material but still the fountain & its tank is quiet easy to maintain / All the electrical arrangements are waterproof and there is no place for leakage of electricity, making it safe for minors / Water pump can be replaced very easily at time of fault and there are numerous small pumps available in local market which are usually satisfy the needs of small water cooler.
node.alt: Chronikle Designer Polystone 4 Steps Indoor Table Top Water Fountain with LED Lights and Water Pump Beige 41cm X 31cm X 23cm
